title: Companion Accessibility Tool & AI Chatbot
application: Full Stack Website | For a Client
description: Engineered Companion, a full stack application chatbot and resource tool. A GPT-4o powered tool that empowers university educators to enhance course accessibility on the Canvas Learning Management System. Features a fully animated and responsive chatbot UI, accessibility-tuned responses, conversation history state management, and a .CSV file parser. This was my semester long project where, I worked with a team of peers for an external client in both planning, design, and software development.
